class_notes: Prior completion of PSYC 110, or  PSYC 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology.
course_description: An examination of the legal definitions of insanity and psychological test validity, the courtroom applications of the psychology of perception and memory, and the applied psychologist's law-imposed responsibilities.
